Articles.Content:
Hello guys!

As you already know, we had experienced some troubles with our server few weeks ago. We were working hard to solve this and now I have to announce that in this week we will be migrating all the site to another server that we hope will be able to bear all the traffic.

Maybe during the week you'll see that the site goes down, so we ask you for your patience and understanding while this happens.

When everything returns to normal, we will notify you.

Cheers.

//------- EDIT ------//

Sorry guys. This week was impossible to do the migration, so it'll be next week.

Enjoy the site for one more weekend!

Good to know ill pack my stuff.

[glow=red,2,300]-Loads rocket's-[/glow]
